articles.title: Tesla share price tanks nearly 10% on Musk comments - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Tesla has already slashed prices six times this year and chief Elon Musk suggested more such moves ahead.
articles.content: Teslas shares sank by nearly 10 percent on Thursday after Chief Executive Elon Musk signalled the electric vehicle maker will keep cutting prices to drive up demand even after taking a big hit to mar… [+2117 chars]

articles.author: Elliot Smith
articles.title: UK inflation is just not going down as cost of living crisis offers 'no respite' - CNBC
articles.description: U.K. inflation remained stubbornly in double digits in March, driven largely by soaring food prices, as the country's cost-of-living crisis showed little sign of abating.
articles.content:
